description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, located at the confluence of several major rivers including the Ganga and Gandak. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement in an area heavily reliant on agriculture and transport logistics. It facilitates essential services for the seven blocks of the district, playing a vital role in the transport infrastructure of the Munger Division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
